note.p: The argument limits the waiting period in seconds for a socket to be established when connecting to a remote host. A value of 0 (the default value) indicates no timeout.

Possible values:
<n>s - duration in seconds, e.g.: 30s
<n>s - duration in seconds, e.g.: 30s
Combined values (with blank as separator): e.g.: 1m 30s
